description: Lists categories for all event source types, or, if specified, for a specified source type. You can see a list of the event categories and source types in Working with Events and Notifications in the Database Migration Service User Guide.

parameters.name: SourceType
parameters.description: The type of DMS resource that generates events. Valid values: replication-instance | replication-task.

parameters.name: Filters
parameters.description: Filters applied to the event categories. (dict) --- Identifies the name and value of a filter object. This filter is used to limit the number and type of DMS objects that are returned for a particular Describe* call or similar operation. Filters are used as an optional parameter for certain API operations. The name of the filter as specified for a Describe* or similar operation. The filter value, which can specify one or more values used to narrow the returned results. (string) ---

nested_params.name: Name
nested_params.description: The name of the filter as specified for a Describe* or similar operation.

nested_params.name: Values
nested_params.description: The filter value, which can specify one or more values used to narrow the returned results.

nested_items.name: SourceType
nested_items.description: The type of DMS resource that generates events.

nested_items.name: EventCategories
nested_items.description: A list of event categories from a source type that you've chosen.
